scions.insc_cntn: However, the "Pursuit of God" is considered a vice to those stuck in the mindsets of "the world".

scions.insc_term: You shall have no other gods before Me.
You are the light of the world.
Source of the Light of the Great Angel
Receiving the Crown of Christ is the attainment of the Work
